alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 18 at 9:49AM EST until February 18 at 12:45PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... An Ice Jam in... South Central Clinton County in northern New York... North Central Essex County in northern New York... * Until 1245 PM EST. * At 949 AM EST, The public and trained spotters have reported an ice jam on the Ausable River at Ausable Forks. Impacts are expected to homes and businesses. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding from an ice jam. SOURCE...Public and trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas near the ice jam. * Downtown Ausable Forks. This includes the following streams and drainages... East Branch Ausable River, West Branch Ausable River. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Ice jams are unpredictable, and rapid fluctuations in water levels are possible. Please obey all road closures and instructions from local authorities. Move to higher ground immediately. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
